rules.query: select rawChannel.userId as userId , rawChannel.pageId as pageId , urCache.regionId as areaId from rawChannel [now], urCache where rawChannel.userId=urCache.userId

rules.view: select pageId, areaId, userId from clickChannel [RANGE 1 SECOND SLIDE 1 SECOND]
select pageId, areaId, userId from clickChannel [RANGE 1 MINUTE SLIDE 1 MINUTE]
select pageId, areaId, userId from clickChannel [RANGE 30 MINUTE SLIDE 1 SECOND]
rules.query: ISTREAM( select pageId, areaId, count(*) as pv, count(distinct(userId)) as uv from viewSec group by pageId, areaId)
ISTREAM( select pageId, areaId, count(*) as pv, count(distinct(userId)) as uv from viewMin group by pageId, areaId)
ISTREAM( select pageId, areaId, count(*) as pv, count(distinct(userId)) as uv from view30Min group by pageId, areaId)
